aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.experience: +2 years of experience in front-end and over 1 year of experience in full-stack development.
aboutMe.description: With high adaptability to teamwork, understanding of assigned requirements to design software solutions, investigative, responsible for setting objectives, fulfilling achievements, and able to work with or without direct supervision.
aboutMe.description2: Innovative and have a facility to understand business processes, which allows me to develop applications with a willingness to learn. In my free time, I play the piano and sometimes compose my own songs also enjoy listening to music, playing table tennis, watching series and movies, playing video games, and role-playing games like D&D.

workExperienceList.description-1: Developed the internal web application for the corporate web manual as a FrontEnd developer where I provided support in UX and accessibility issues using the Scrum methodology. I reported to the Scrum Master and we held weekly meetings with the Product Owner.
workExperienceList.description-2: Developed an internal application for the creation and management of forms in the HR department of the company where I provided support in UX, optimization, and data control using the Scrum methodology. I reported to the Scrum Master and we held daily meetings with the Product Owner.

workExperienceList.description-1: Designed and developed the website Coralesacuarimantima.org using Wordpress, Spectra, and DreamHost. This is a platform to showcase the Corales Acuariamantima foundation, display their projects and activities, and able to receive donations to continue their research and preserve the area.

Designed and developed the website Astrolab-bio.com.co using WordPress, and Hostinger. This is a platform to showcase Astrolab Bio, display their projects and activities, and able to sell their products.

Designed and developed the website convexorealestatelaw.com using WordPress and Hostinger. This platform showcases Convexo, displays its real estate projects, legal activities, and offers its services for sale.
I developed the web application Urbanik.co as a FrontEnd/FullStack developer and provided support on UX/UI and accessibility matters using the Scrum methodology.
workExperienceList.description-2: I supported the management of cloud services, helping with the configuration, maintenance, and optimization of the cloud infrastructure. I also contributed to the overall project architecture, providing input on technical and structural decisions to ensure scalability and efficiency.
workExperienceList.description-3: I collaborated on public relations tasks, representing the company in various settings and helping strengthen its external presence. I also took part in operational management, supporting the organization and assisting in day-to-day decision-making.

workExperienceList.description-1: Provided personalized consulting to entrepreneurs as part of the Digital Initiation project with the Cámara de Comercio and UNIMINUTO.

projectsAndResearchList.title: Research: Gamification Systems.
projectsAndResearchList.description: Conducted research on Gamification systems and techniques for user retention, adding a prediction system to the platform to recommend the appropriate technique and system for each user.

projectsAndResearchList.title: Research: Player behavior in microtransaction systems.
projectsAndResearchList.description: Conducted research on the behavior of players in microtransaction systems to determine how users are affected and how scenarios where such systems are implemented work, using a simulation made with Vensim.

projectsAndResearchList.title: Web-based Numerical Methods Calculator
projectsAndResearchList.description: Python and JavaScript web application that provided a diverse list of numerical methods, which were calculated and displayed results onscreen, and graphed when necessary. Each method was explained with instructions on how it works and which data to use to make it work.

certifications.title: Fundamentals of Parallelism on Intel Architecture
DevOps con Docker, Jenkins, Kubernetes, git, GitFlow CI y CD

cookiesConsent.title: Cookies
cookiesConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can accept or reject.
